name.description: Name of the filter field. Valid values can be found in the [SSM DescribeMaintenanceWindows API Reference](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/systems-manager/latest/APIReference/API_DescribeMaintenanceWindows.html#API_DescribeMaintenanceWindows_RequestSyntax).

values.description: Set of values that are accepted for the given filter field. Results will be selected if any given value matches.
